item.title: My experience building a personal website
item.description: This post is very obviously a draft, and more just a collection of thoughts. After a long time of research I finally came around to building my own website. Well, two actually. This is a bit of commentary on how I went about building it and what I want to do with this site in the future. My site is built on two different technologies. The frontpage of my site, nezzy.
